title: Looking for team to manage/coach
body: Looking for a team to manage or help coach/analyse. Rank not a big deal more interested in being invloved in a team which wants to take the game seriously. Feel free to add in game or comment!!!

replies.body:
your on the right track to behonest three weeks ago i was gold 3 and coaching a team and now im diamond 5 just cause i put effort into coaching to help me grow, but you have to be willing to put effort, if your keen there is a team id like for you to take over.

add ign wolves if interested

Not to be a dick or anything, but you should really at least climb to diamond, plat at the minimum before attempting to coach any teams, otherwise most of the advice you give out will be incorrect or only applicable at low elo's which in the long run will have a negative effect on the skill level of the players.
